white: Managing to not strangle Nightshade for a solid twenty-four hours.
I C E  C R E A M !.
Tossing a bag of candy bananas around to waste time.
Seducing every halfling you come across.
The 17 sets of armour Krag is apparently wearing.
Wearing your dead friends around your neck.
Almost joining the cult you're trying to destory.
Wandering around asking if anyone tried to kill you.
The eight gay warlocks that dictate the rules of fashion.
Making an animal handling check for foreplay.
No, Daniel, stop trying to break the game.
When an emotionally drained elf steals your kill you've been tracking for months.
Juggling food only to get it all on the roof.
Do you have a moment to talk about our lord and savior Gruumsh?.
Drinking 7 litres of whiskey and not dying.
Having your assassin turn into your bodyguard.
Umranth's indefinite 'it's not a phase mom' phase.
Rolling a 10,000 Wild Magic surge check.
Convoluted, extensive and highly unnecessary backstories.
Getting harassed by an angsty teen.
Trying to seduce monsters that can't understand you.
THERE ARE TOO MANY DRAGONS HELP-.
